mapper.sql: id, appid, voice_name, voice_size, voice_url, status, common, create_date, update_date
mapper.select: select a.app_name ,a.appid,b.id, a.create_date createDate ,b.create_date ,b.voice_url, b.voice_size,b.voice_name,b.status,b.common from tb_app_info a left join tb_app_voice b on a.appid = b.appid where a.status = '00' AND a.bus_type = '02' and a.sid = #{params.sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY a.create_date DESC

select a.app_name ,a.appid,b.id, a.create_date createDate ,b.create_date ,b.voice_url, b.voice_size,b.voice_name,b.status,b.common from tb_app_info a left join tb_app_voice b on a.appid = b.appid where a.status = '00' AND a.bus_type = '05' and a.sid = #{params.sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
select count(1) from tb_app_voice where appid = #{params.appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from tb_app_voice where status = '00' and appid = #{params.appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select voice_url from tb_app_voice WHERE appid = #{params.appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update tb_app_voice
voice_name = #{voiceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
common = '', create_date = NOW()
where appid = #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_app_voice
voice_name = #{voiceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
voice_size = #{voiceSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
voice_url = #{voiceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
common = #{common,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where appid = #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_app_voice set appid = #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, voice_name = #{voiceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, voice_size = #{voiceSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, voice_url = #{voiceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, common = #{common,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where appid = #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
